sentences.english: It also describes the related optical singal processing and optical wavelength changer technology.
sentences.chinese: 再说明其相关的光信号处理和光波长转换技术。

sentences.english: Equation (7) is the model dealing with error signals of symmetric faculae.
sentences.chinese: 式即为均匀光斑的误差信号处理模型。

sentences.english: POSIX signal handling is done in kernel space.
sentences.chinese: POSIX信号处理在内核空间中完成。

sentences.english: The signal processing circuit has high ability to suppress noise interference.
sentences.chinese: 信号处理电路具有较强的抑制噪声干扰能力。

sentences.english: It is especially suitable for the Doppler filtering in the signal processing of …
sentences.chinese: 它特别适应于频率捷变雷达信号处理中的多卜勒滤波。

sentences.english: SummaryThe subject of adaptive filters constitutes an important part of modern signal processing.
sentences.chinese: 自适应滤波器是现代信号处理的一个重要组成部分。

sentences.english: This signal handling data can be vital in some cases.
sentences.chinese: 这一信号处理数据在某些情况中非常重要。

sentences.english: The circuit of stimulating magnetism and signal processing are included in the circuit of fluxgate.
sentences.chinese: 其磁通门电路包括激磁和信号处理电路。

sentences.english: The signal processing is a critical step in the wind profiling extraction.
sentences.chinese: 信号处理是风廓线获取的关键。

sentences.english: Traditional fluxgate adopts analog circuit to process its output signal.
sentences.chinese: 传统磁通门传感器主要采用模拟电路进行信号处理。

sentences.english: Anti-aliasing is the application of signal processing in rasterization.
sentences.chinese: 反走样技术是信号处理在光栅化过程中的应用。

sentences.english: Source coding and channel coding are two important aspects of signal processing.
sentences.chinese: 信源编码与信道编码是信号处理的两个重要研究方向。

sentences.english: It is especially suitable for the Doppler filtering in the signal…
sentences.chinese: 它特别适应于频率捷变雷达信号处理中的多卜勒滤波。

sentences.english: Wide-band direction finding is a difficult topic of research in array signal processing field.
sentences.chinese: 宽带测向一直是阵列信号处理领域研究的难点。

sentences.english: An important research field in modern signal processing is the research of robust parameter estimation techniques.
sentences.chinese: 稳健的参数估计技术是现代信号处理的重要研究领域。

sentences.english: The feedforward neural networks has been greatly used in the nonlinear signals processing.
sentences.chinese: 前馈神经网已经被大量用于非线性信号处理。

definition: filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
